attributes.additional_details: By signing this petition, we join our voices in harmony to support the much-needed renovation of Ravenscraig Castle. Together, we can ensure that this historic monument stands strong, continues to educate, and inspires awe for many years to come.
attributes.background:
Ravenscraig Castle has weathered the tests of time and witnessed the passage of countless years.
However, time has taken it’s toll on this castle, leading to the gradual loss of its former glory. It is with a deep responsibility that we must address this issue.

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level.
 
In any case, management of Ravenscraig Castle is a matter for Historic Environment Scotland, not the Government or Parliament.
